pages.text: With soul energy, you conjure forth powerful immobile vines to block your targets path or, if crouching/shifting, conjure forth a powerful flowered vine that shoots poisonous quills. Shift-casting while looking at a target will cause the poisonous vine to be summoned next to you instead.

Casting the spell underwater will summon powerful immobile kelps instead. No difference other than aesthetic and need to be underwater, though the poisonous kelp's quills aren't affected by water. Wearing a $(l:crafts/garment/wild_robe)Wild Robe$() allows you to move past the vines and kelps.
